metadata.synopsis: Father Abdirak is beating himself with a scourge. He is kneeling and striking his back with it. Voice breathless with both pain and pleasure.

0.speaker: Abdirak
0.context: CinematicNodeContext: Striking himself with a scourage. NodeContext: These are all made as you're in pain - but you're happy. You're hissing in pain at times, teeth greeting, but offering your pain and the act itself up to your goddess.
